site_description: A simple example of using Paraglide with Astro
display_button_car: This Example aims to help you integrate Paraglide with your Multi-Language Astro app. Paraglide is a great fit for the interactive parts of your app, like forms, app-shells, or this counter:
street_board_orange: Because Paraglide treeshakes very well, each island only ships the message it actually uses. This means that you can use Paraglide in your app without worrying about the size of your JS bundle.
